participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and playful, Emily enjoys lighthearted conversations and often uses emojis to express her feelings.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i've a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. i like to watch nhl hockey. i enjoy coloring books.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and protective, Tom is always looking out for others and often reflects on his life experiences.
participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.
